title: .hack//G.U. Returner
synopsis: The characters from previous .hack//G.U. Games and .hack//Roots receive an email from Ovan. He is requesting them to go to Hidden Forbidden Festival where is set up a mysterious summer festival. There they find an AIDA Chim Chim who wishes to peacefully co-exist with the other players of The World. It then transforms into the word "Returner", so they assume it to mean that Ovan will return to The World.
voices: ['Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Touchi, Hiroki', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Nazuka, Kaori', 'Saiga, Mitsuki', 'Toyoguchi, Megumi', 'Sakaguchi, Daisuke', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Kobayashi, Sanae', 'Enomoto, Atsuko']
staff: [['Morimoto, Kouji', ['Producer']], ['Mashimo, Kouichi', ['Director']], ['Nakano, Tooru', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawasaki, Miu', ['Script', ' Screenplay']]]
